parts.text:
IMAGE REFERENCES
Character references:
- Hegseth - Satire — Character reference images:
  - Hegseth — Usage: Use this image only for the character’s facial identity and expression; do not copy clothing, background, or other details literally.

STYLE
Core Style:
- Render domain: Comic Illustration
- Genre / subject focus: Slice of Life
- Visual influences: American Comic

Line & Detail:
- Detail level: Highly Detailed

Color & Lighting:
- Lighting style: Soft, Even Light
- Color palette: bold_colors
- Saturation: medium

Rendering Technique:
- Shading: Cel Shading
- Texture treatment: Smooth / Clean
- Surface finish: Matte Finish

Composition & Camera:
- Camera style: Cinematic Framing
- Focal length / lens feel: Normal Lens Feel

Mood & Atmosphere:
- Mood keywords: Whimsical

Caricature & Exaggeration:
- Exaggeration level: Strong caricature
- Head-to-body exaggeration: Noticeably oversized head (cartoon proportion)
- Eye exaggeration: Large, highly expressive eyes
- Mouth exaggeration: Large, highly expressive mouth
- Eyebrow exaggeration: Bold, highly expressive eyebrows
- Jaw / chin exaggeration: Strong, stylized jawline or chin
- Elastic shape distortion: Highly elastic, cartoon-like forms
- Intentional asymmetry: Strong, intentional asymmetry
- Silhouette exaggeration: Strong, stylized silhouette
- Expression exaggeration: Highly expressive, theatrical
- Likeness preservation: Very strong likeness preservation
- Line style: Expressive hand-drawn lines

CHARACTERS

CHARACTER — Hegseth - Satire

TASK
Hegseth sits in a bathtub with a camouflage bath cap. He's using a toy missile to slam a toy fishing boat in the bathtub. I rubber duck sits on the edge of the tub using it's wings to shield it's eyes from the horror. 3 generals peak in through the bathroom door very concerned about what they are seeing.

TEXT ELEMENTS
- No speech or thought bubbles.

Image reference: Hegseth — Character reference images.
Usage: Use this image only for the character’s facial identity and expression; do not copy clothing, background, or other details literally.
